A: 1. A clock face shows _-hour times (a)10 (b)12 (c)24
2. The long hand on a clock is called the _ hand (a)hour (b)minute (c)second
3. The minute hand tells the number of _ past or to the hour (a)hours (b)seconds (c)minutes
4. The short hand on a clock is called the _ hand (a)hour (b)minute (c)long
5. The time "4 o'clock" means the hour hand points to the number _ (a)12 (b)4 (c)8
6. The time "8 o'clock" means the hour hand points to the number _ (a)12 (b)4 (c)8
7. At "o'clock" times, the minute hand points to the number _ (a)3 (b)6 (c)12
8. "Half past 5" means the minute hand points to the number _ (a)3 (b)6 (c)9
9. "5:00" is the digital time for _ o'clock (a)five (b)half past five (c)quarter past five
10. "5:30" is the digital time for _ past five (a)quarter (b)half (c)full
11. The number of hours on a standard clock face is _ (a)6 (b)10 (c)12
12. The minute hand moves _ than the hour hand (a)slower (b)faster (c)the same
13. To tell time, you look at the position of the clock's _ (a)numbers (b)hands (c)face
14. When the hour hand is on 5 and the minute hand is on 12, the time is _ o'clock (a)five (b)twelve (c)one
15. When the hour hand is on 5 and the minute hand is on 6, the time is half past _ (a)six (b)five (c)twelve
16. Analogue clocks use _ to show time (a)digits (b)hands (c)words
17. Digital clocks use _ to show time (a)hands (b)pictures (c)numbers
18. What does the long hand tell us (a)the hour (b)the minute (c)the second
19. What does the short hand tell us (a)the hour (b)the minute (c)the second
20. How many hands does a basic clock face usually have (a)one (b)two (c)three
B: 1. The long hand on a clock is called the _________ hand.
2. The short hand on a clock is called the _________ hand.
3. A standard clock face shows _________ hour times.
4. What is "5 o'clock" an example of _________ time.
5. What is "5:00" an example of _________ time.
C: 1. What is the long hand on a clock called?
2. What is the short hand on a clock called?
3. How many hours does a standard clock face show?
4. What kind of time is "half past 5"?
